statements: SELECT * FROM misinformation_tracking;
SELECT post_id, user_id, timestamp FROM misinformation_tracking WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM misinformation_tracking WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM misinformation_tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM misinformation_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_content, user_id, timestamp FROM misinformation_tracking WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_tracking WHERE user_id = 50 AND interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, interaction_type FROM misinformation_tracking WHERE interaction_type IN ('comment', 'share') ORDER BY post_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM misinformation_tracking GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY interactions_count DESC;

SELECT user_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM misinformation_tracking WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id, interaction_type ORDER BY user_id ASC, interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT username, interaction_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_content, misinformation_category FROM misinformation WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM misinformation WHERE misinformation_category = 'fake news' ORDER BY misinformation_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS num_posts FROM misinformation GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_posts > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, COUNT(user_id) as total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY username HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT post_content, misinformation_category FROM misinformation WHERE misinformation_category = 'Fake News' ORDER BY misinformation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) as total_posts FROM misinformation GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT post_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT post_content, misinformation_score FROM MisinformationPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT reporter_id, report_reason FROM MisinformationReports WHERE post_id = 500;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type='like';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE post_id=123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_content, post_date FROM MisinformationPosts WHERE misinformation_score > 0.5 LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT reporter_id FROM MisinformationReports WHERE report_reason LIKE '%misleading%';
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_date FROM MisinformationPosts JOIN UserInteractions ON MisinformationPosts.user_id = UserInteractions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS post_count FROM posts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM reactions WHERE reaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY reaction_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, user_id FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM comments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_comments > 10;

SELECT u.username, p.post_content, r.reaction_type FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN reactions r ON p.post_id = r.post_id WHERE r.reaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MisinformationUsers;
SELECT username, email FROM MisinformationUsers ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM MisinformationPosts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, post_id FROM MisinformationLikes WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, report_type, report_date FROM MisinformationReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MisinformationUsers WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM MisinformationUsers WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, post_content, post_date FROM MisinformationPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, username, like_date FROM MisinformationPosts JOIN MisinformationLikes ON MisinformationPosts.post_id = MisinformationLikes.post_id;
SELECT * FROM MisinformationComments WHERE comment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY comment_id ASC;
